website_summaries.verdict: Thanks to its "never-leak technology," you can be sure you won't wake up in a saggy airbed.
pros: takes 1 to 2 minutes depending on which size you choose
We love the nonslip base and comfortable flocked top
cons: Strong plastic smell can take a few days to dissipate

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional airbed.
customer_reviews.text: Love this air matress! It blows up very quickly, as promised in the description. It appears to be very durable after being used as a trampoline and wrestling ring for 2 toddlers, dog and cat over the last few days. One side has a soft blue layer that is a nice touch. It has been blown up for a few days now and hasn't appeared to lose air at all which is also nice. It will be great for visitors in the upcoming weeks, but until then it will be great for entertaining children and my husband if he annoys me ;).
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Zigrosser

customer_reviews.title: It held up well!
customer_reviews.text: We inflated it and let it sit as the instructions advised. The built in pump is lightning fast, it blew up in 60-70 seconds and was nice and firm. This company definitely cares about it customers, we received our warranty card and also they list their customer service number on the bed above the pump which is convenient if I ever have an issue. The company emailed us after we got it to make sure we were all set. Class act. I think this bed will be a long term keeper for guests, camping, and travel. The 2-year warranty is nice as well!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Glamping, here we come!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed for our upcoming camping weekend and am so excited to upgrade our usual experience. Our car has a regular outlet, so we are bringing this along for a more comfortable night’s sleep. I love that we can use this indoors or outdoors. I followed the instructions that came with it and inflated the bed before we left so that the material can stretch out, and the size looks awesome. The pump was fast and I like that it comes with a bag to take it in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Grandchildren
customer_reviews.text: I got this new bed for my grandkids to sleep on when I watch them overnight. It inflated quickly to a firm bed and has held air well over the weekend. I did inflate the day that I got it as the instructions said to let it stretch the first time you blow it up which seems to have worked. The boys were really excited to sleep on the blow up “big” bed, and thankfully slept through the night. This seems to be a very nice quality bed and easy enough for me to use on my own.
customer_reviews.author: Marie F.

customer_reviews.title: 10 STARS.....and NOTHING LESS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Enerplex has the BEST customer service I have ever experienced.....PERIOD!!!! Their products are 100% SOLID!!! I highly recommend Enerplex......I have NEVER been more pleased with the service or quality of the product. Five stars in no way demonstrates Enerplexs commitment to nothing less than 100% customer service. My reviews are always honest, fair and blunt....if I like something I will tell you, at the same time, if something is garbage, I will also tell you....plain and simple. Not Enerplex, they are 10 ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐'s GUARANTEED the best!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Botanique Baron Samedi

customer_reviews.title: Durable, comfortable, affordable, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Mattress arrived today and my kids and I decided to blow it up and give it a try. My 8 year old kids opened it up and read the directions and I sat back while they did it! So simple! We timed the inflation and it took 2 minutes.. No joke. This this is awesome. The 3 of us got on it along with our cat and her claws didn't rupture it! Can't wait to bring it camping or to our family's house (no guest room). It fits nicely in a bag, easy for travel. Get a smaller one and take it to the hotel with you! Great item. Want one in every size!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: King Size Air Mattress
customer_reviews.text: We are thrilled with our purchase of this King Size Air Mattress! We have purchased it for our guests but, after spending a very comfortable night on it, we may be taking it over for our own use!
customer_reviews.author: harriette

customer_reviews.title: Inflates in one minute! Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend! Super fast inflation, comfortable to sleep on, and comes with a heavy duty storage bag with strong handles! Check out the unboxing video we uploaded.
customer_reviews.author: FoFacy

customer_reviews.title: Solid secondary bed
customer_reviews.text: If you never had an air mattress boy have they come a long way. The pump technology this bed offers is incredible, it comes with a large carry bag so you can store when not using it. I am amazed at how comfortable the bed is, the top layer is perfect. The bed is also very thick so I think it will do well against holes or punctures. I am not a big reviewer but this deserved one!
customer_reviews.author: William Powell

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable Sleeping
customer_reviews.text: I bought this air mattress for a recent camping trip. My tent was on a rocky patch of ground and this mattress worked perfectly for me to sleep well and soundly even with the hard and rocky ground underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Burris

customer_reviews.title: Best inflatable bed
customer_reviews.text: This bed is the best inflatable I ever owned. I’ve had Walmart and Target brand and they can’t even touch this one in quality. It’s ridiculously easy to set up, inflate and it is also super comfortable. The height makes it’s feel like a regular bed. Bought a memory foam topper and it almost feels like a Tempurpedic bed. On two weeks I had to add a bit of air once, exceptional quality. Absolutely love!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Spare yourself headache!
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to buy it after reading all the reviews. I have had an air mattress from Costco for 1.5yrs and thought it was time to change (nothing wrong with it, still holds air). It has been a month and I have used it only 4 times!!! It does NOT hold air. It doesn't fully deflate but half way through the night you feel being sunk in and back hurting ( I am only $130 lbs). Will try to get a refund as it's ridiculous waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality airbed and exceptional customer service from mayfairbrand.com
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bed for a daily sleeper while my life is in transition after a move. It is extremely comfortable, easy to inflate and refill. I usually hate airbeds but this one was great. When I moved to a permanent home last week, my bed had a small leak. I contacted the seller, emailed my amazon invoice and they immediately replaced it. They even helped me when I mixed up my new address! Outstanding! They deserve 8 stars for exceptional customer service...no waiting on hold endlessly or anything. Very nice experience.
customer_reviews.author: Barye Bluth

customer_reviews.title: Leaked
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress back in October we were remodeling a spare room I put it up one night my friend slept on it after 3 nights it started leaking air I found a tiny slit in the seam where it came apart I taped it aired it back up by morning with no one sleeping on it sprang another leak not sure where it was located just packed it up and started a return on the item. Think it was poorly made or at least the one I received was!
customer_reviews.author: Mary A. Mays

customer_reviews.title: A pretty good air mattress
customer_reviews.text: Came completely broken the spring was piped out and wouldn’t lock back in and the pump would not turn on at all! Had to blow it up and duct tape the hole closed because I had out of town guests and everything was closed. Was pretty comfortable to sleep on and Amazon did return with no problems at all!! Love amazon!! Update: adding another star because the seller contacted me and sent me a whole new mattress!! That is the really great customer service! It is very comfortable and sturdy and I really appreciate them fixing the problem!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Stone

customer_reviews.title: Customer service seems important
customer_reviews.text: Update: So I returned the first one I got, for a hole. It was probably my fault. They sent a new one right away, customer service was no problem. Now, due to Covid, my daughter moved back in with me and has been using the mattress daily for about 2 months. Every day blown up and taken down. There have been NO issues. Mattress works great, doesn't leak or deflate at all. Turned out to be a really great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Moore

customer_reviews.title: it lasted 4 months. But the seller did an awesome job in replacing it.
customer_reviews.text: A hole that cannot be patched on a seem. If I touch it, it will open more. There is no way it can be patched with the little plastic they issue. It happened a month ago. After notifying the seller, they agreed to replace it with a new one right away. That is Quality Service...
customer_reviews.author: Captain

customer_reviews.title: Truth in Advertising.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this wonderful air-mattress back in February (2020) right before my move to lighten up my move. Gave away my Queen bed for this (where folks thinks I'm NUTS to do so). I've waited a couple of months or so - so I can put this product to the test. Test result: A+++. It's now almost June and I'm still sleeping on this mattress every night (and afternoon naps!). Now I'm having a change of mind/heart if I even need to order a real bed. This air-mattress is so comfy. I can tell it's built-to-last. Thank YOU for a wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Ding-Dong

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Horrible air mattress. It was not a double tall mattress it measures 16” high from the floor and much narrower than a twin size. My twin sheets are swimming on this. I inflated it until it auto shut off but the mattress is so soft and low that it’s uncomfortable. a total waste of my money. I would have been better off in a sleeping bag. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Hole after one use
customer_reviews.text: Popped after first use. I would not get this product. Wife had to sleep on the couch the rest of the Thanksgiving week as relatives slept in our bedroom. I slept on the floor in my own house. Argh. Get a more durable mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Dies not do the job
customer_reviews.text: Third time we plug it in! Each time over 2 minutes. It does not fill up to the capacità
customer_reviews.author: Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Superior Quality
customer_reviews.text: The air mattress is as described. I just blew it up and it inflated lightning fast. It is very comfortable, I am going to let it get it’s form and add some more air as suggested as the material needs to stretch. The quality seems very good at first glance, we plan to use it for guests and for an upcoming camping trip. The product comes with a 2-year warranty card which put us at ease. I am very happy with the purchase and looking forward to continued use!
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money it lasted one day and went flat I’m only 195 pounds
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our teenage boys friends when they sleep over. I have not personally tried it but the boys say it works great and their friends don’t mind sleeping on it. It has been used at least 4 times so far. We purchased the twin size and will most likely purchase another as both of my boys tend to have friends over at the same time ☺️
customer_reviews.author: Jason Conover

customer_reviews.title: Did not hold air after one months use
customer_reviews.text: The air bed was very comfortable when it held air. In a little over a month of use on my carpeted bedroom, it started to lose air. I had to wake up during the night to reinflate it. I was not going to try and find the leak at all. The air bed includes some small patches and it is a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought twin size for company. I just didn't have room for them all but the person who got this bed was really happy with this bed. He could adjust he firmness and he slept like a log. I put it on a daybed trundle which was low to the floor so he had trouble getting up off it (bad knees). So comfort is great, really easy to inflate, and so far appears durable. I had to run the cat off it a few times and he never punctured it. I guess I had beach ball quality in mind but I was way off! I do recommend this bed especially if it's off the floor/ground for an older person.
customer_reviews.author: Tawanna

customer_reviews.title: Popped a seam after 7 weeks of use
customer_reviews.text: This is supposed to be a quality mattress that has popped a seam two months in. I am Past the Amazon return period by a few weeks. No instructions on the warranty from the manufacturer. I’m very dissapointed
customer_reviews.author: NeMplsMary

customer_reviews.title: Firm, High-Quality, Worth Every Penny!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical buying another air mattress, since the last two hurts my back. I needed a temp mattress solution before we can move back into our home. This mattress came in shocking of how sturdy, firm, and so easy to inflate. My back pain went away after sleeping on it for 2-days. My 2 year old son and I both have been sleeping on this for almost a full week and we are loving it. Needless to say, this is more comfortable than my expensive Beautyrest Black edition mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Lee

customer_reviews.title: Awful deflates within hours.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this product based on some reviews. I received this the night before thanksgiving. This is not worth the the money or purchase. You blow it up and it doesn’t not hold up at all. It deflates right away within hours. . A pvc blow up mattress should hold up through the the night. My 120 pound daughter woke up to a deflated mattress in the middle of the night. I bought the queen mattress which was almost 90 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Kiefer

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Needed a temporary bed. This air mattress was lightweight, unfolded easily, and inflated as quickly as was advertised. Easy to set up just plug in, switch on and turn the valve. Deflated easily too, but did need some squeezing to get all the air out. I found that it lost air, also, fairly quickly, though the center of the bed remained firm -- it was the sides that softened. Strong plastic smell on taking out of the box, faded quite a bit before bedtime. Served its purpose and I will use again.
customer_reviews.author: mcerner

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: We ordered a bed at the end of February, worked great very comfortable. In late May it developed a leak. The manufactuter offers a two-year warranty and they were fantastic to work with :-). I submitted a warranty claim on their website and got a call back in 15 minutes WOW. The representative sent us out a new replacement via FedEx 2nd day delivery. EnerPlex really does stand behind their product and TWO YEAR warranty which I have to say for an Air-Mattress, is really unique, I would recommend the product as very comfortable and EnerPlex really takes care of their customers after the sale.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Seam are not very strong
customer_reviews.text: The oval baffle seam on the felted side of the mattress gave way after a month of use. I tried using the cellophane tape patches that come with the bed, but they are useless. The seam that gave way is a factory defect. Normal use should not cause this kind of problem. The bed is comfortable and the pump inflates the bed almost instantly, but the construction is not up to speed. If I can't inflate or sleep on the bed, I'm giving it 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Eldredge

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a month and then died! Directions to inflate aren't hard--it just decided to expel air all the time right after the warranty expired.
customer_reviews.author: C. Alex Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Not a Happy Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately for me this purchase was not a good buy. I had this bed for only a week and quickly noticed that once I blow it up with air it would be nice and firm for a while, but during the night it would lose the air horribly. I tried it out for the first week and by the fourth day i had to keep refilling it with air. I purchased the king size mainly because of the reviews, but ended up very disappointed with the durability of the bed for such a short time. I really had high hopes for this purchase and thought it would definitely work for my purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Meshia Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and the material seems extra thick. Inflate/deflate very fast with built in pump. My queen mattress (I ordered one twin and one queen) came in a regular brown cardboard box and looked used. I contacted the seller, and they made it right, right away. Sent a new one with no issues. Excellent customer care, quality product.
customer_reviews.author: david mikel

customer_reviews.title: Worked well as an easy to use and comfortable temporary bed.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as temp bed for use during move. Inflates and deflates as advertised. Does need a touch-up of air each night, but not much. Was used indoors, so no info on camping durability, but held 200 # person and restless 75# German Shepard, who has been known to dig into beds. A bit awkward to fold, and stow, but comes with carry bag that does not require a perfect factory fold to get bed into bag. As for comfort, appears to be well designed. Unlike many air mattresses, there is no tendency for mattress to move under sleeper, so more like a regular mattress than most I have slept on.
customer_reviews.author: Dr D

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Durable, Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: The air bed came fast and just in the nick of time. We had company in town for the holiday weekend. I was nervous because I never used and air mattress, but my guests said they loved it! The bed stayed inflated and blew up super fast. We blew it up the night before so it could stretch out and then topped it off with some extra air the next day. It kept its form and held the air well. I may grab another for our beach house, these things come in handy! The company made sure we were all set, great product and great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described, our search is over!
customer_reviews.text: We needed an air mattress for our finished basement, this held air extremely well and is exactly what we were looking for. The top flocked part is very nice material and the bed expanded and blew up well. I would advise topping it off with air per the directions, it will work perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: NDK

customer_reviews.title: LEAKING🥺🥺🥺 Horrible purchase
customer_reviews.text: Its leaking already and only 3 months old and already have had to repair 3 holes. They all occur in the circle design. Very sorry with purchase and now have given up and ordered a different brand. Did text company and have not received a reply.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't buckle in the middle!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mattress for camping to replace our old mattress that sagged in the middle and wouldn't hold air (old mattress had these problems from the beginning, not just because it was old). This mattress did not buckle in the middle, and after 3 nights did not need to be reinstated. Keep in mind, you must plug it in to inflate and the cord isn't terribly long. We pack an extension cord and plug it into out truck to inflate/deflate. Inflation took about 2 minutes, 3 minutes, tops.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Thew

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: The airbed came fast and was exactly as advertised. It is comfortable and the carry bag is very big, the bed fits nicely and stores easily after use. We will be using this for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to inflate and deflate. I put my old air mattess on top of the enerplex to compare. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Leaky and unusable
customer_reviews.text: I have the queen version of this and love it, but it takes all the available room in my home office when I have friends visiting, with no space to walk around it, so I bought the smaller one. And well. It looks the same, feels the same, and the inflating system is great. Unfortunately there is a leak somewhere, that I haven't been able to find, and the mattress deflates in a couple hours with no-one on it. So I got a dud, which would be understandable to a certain level (happens, I guess) but given that there's a bunch of other reviews saying the same thing, it's not a random QA issue.
customer_reviews.author: GCL

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: This is as described, it inflated lightning fast and was very comfortable, I would definitely recommend it and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: marques

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't hold air all night
customer_reviews.text: I bought this air mattress to use in our motorhome for when our son comes with us. We recently went on a 3 week trip out west and the mattress was great for the 1st week. The 2nd week it started losing about half it's air by morning. By the 3rd week, it's flat by morning. I got online to return it and it shows it's past due for return. They allowed 5 weeks. I bought it a couple weeks before we left for our trip, we were gone 3 weeks so now I'm stuck with a useless, expensive air mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Had a problem, but problem solved!
customer_reviews.text: I live with my sister 3 nights a week for work and use an air mattress on those nights. I bought the twin mattress and was very satisfied with my purchase. Then 3 months in, the mattress started to leak, a slow leak, but enough to make it an immediate problem. Next day I called and they were on it right away. I was sent a new mattress and it was shipped and arrived very quickly. I have literally slept on my new mattress 3 nights now, so far so good !! I will send an update if anything changes! Thank you customer service for making a dire situation a pain-free and problem solved, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Filled up quickly & looks great!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use with our young granddaughters when they come to visit. We blew it up soon after it arrived & was thrilled how quickly it filled up. It looks great & we're excited to be able to use it but have not had guests here yet. I also love that it folds down so easily & has a carrying bag!!! I'm sorry I can't say how it is to sleep on but looks like our other one & assuming it will be great!!! Arrived quickly also in great condition!!! Very pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: junk
customer_reviews.text: Would not buy again. Valves leak only had this 7 months, used three times and will not hold air. very useless now. Spend a little more get a better mattress
customer_reviews.author: Rngr

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: Went through 2 different mattress both deflated within a week of use had to get a refund for the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY, a product that warrants a review!
customer_reviews.text: I do not usually take the time to review purchases but this airbed has been a gift from the heavens above. Have you ever slept on a couch as a guest, or worst off one of those old flimsy uncomfortable mattress at your third cousin’s house due to space limitation? This is your answer, the bed is so comfortable and inflates in 1 minute, literally. I am so happy with this purchase I may buy one of there camping airbeds as well for next years camping trips I go on. This is a great product and the company really cares, they have an awesome warranty, EnerPlex I am SOLD!
customer_reviews.author: liana astanina

customer_reviews.title: very easy set up
customer_reviews.text: my first one wouldn't hold air but the company sent me another one and its great they have amazing customer service
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Easy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to inflate and deflate. It is so very comfortable to sleep on. It’s even firm and supportive enough for me. Love it! I did experience an issue of a slow leak in the mattress and could not pinpoint it. The 2 year warranty was awesome. The customer service was the best I’ve experienced anywhere. I had a new, replacement mattress within 4 days of reporting the issue. They were so nice and professional.
customer_reviews.author: B-dub

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service! Very uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I originally wrote a bad review as I was so disappointed in the bed as it did not hold air. Requested a replacement, received and am very impressed with the bed! This one held the air overnight! Thank you for responding so quickly. The defected one was sent off yesterday. Hopefully this one will last for years!
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Schuch

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Choice!
customer_reviews.text: This was a really good choice of purchase. I had a hard time deciding because there were so many choices of these type of air mattresses. I finally went with what I believed to have the best reviews and the majority was correct! This is comfortable, a super value for the price, and we've been using it consistently since we received it. I would highly recommend this air bed / mattress if you are looking for value and durability. Excellent choice.
customer_reviews.author: L. Neligan

customer_reviews.title: Good bed, poor customer service. Check your power!
customer_reviews.text: The bed itself is great. It fills up very quickly. However I bought this for camping, and it doesn't work with my portable battery I have with 120v converter. Tried emailing, calling, and submitting a ticket online. Never heard back on any of them, very poor customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Just had this since February & already leaking badly. I was super careful. Had a mattress pad to protect & was careful never to have mattress uncovered. First hole was near where the middle of my back was...no reason for that. I repaired it but it's still leaking & I can't find any other leak. I just end up waking up on the floor. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Over-sized, worst air mattress.
customer_reviews.text: Queen air mattress, queen fitted sheets will not stretch to the edges of this mattress. It is larger than a queen. Bought king size fitted sheet and had to attach elastic straps under the mattress to keep the sheet tight. Which makes it difficult to change sheets. Also higher in the center. Gives new meaning to the phrase "roll out of bed"... Lol. Seriously I sleep OK on it, just those issues... Don't think I would buy another one. 3 months after purchase, still stretching, top being domed is worse. Putting a knife in this thing... It's the worst air mattress I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: TDI Photo

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE - Leaks alot
customer_reviews.text: Was happy when it came. Day 1 - no leak. Day 3 or 4, slightly leaks. Day 65, leaks constantly. So 65 Days Later: Doesn't hold air more than an 30 minutes. Return Policy expires 30 days after Amazon purchase so am out of luck. Their main website won't take returns either after 30 days or Used (whichever first). Just bought memory foam mattress for same price before editing this review. Back hurts. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: great comfy air matress
customer_reviews.text: took this camping and it held up well, not needing (but could have used) extra air inflates quickly only thing i wish was different about it is that i wish it could be inflated with an external pump as well as have the built in pump, was not able to run the built in pump using my cars outlet while running the car but once inflated was a great matress to sleep on
customer_reviews.author: Tom Pittoors

customer_reviews.title: best air mattress I have seen!
customer_reviews.text: WE move so much that I did not want to buy bed sets for our current rental home. I am tired of moving heavy furniture or give it all away every time we move. I have 3 teens, including one with ADHD. WE are tall people, American build. These mattresses have been lasting for months. They are super comfortable and very easy to fill up. I am very happy with our 4 mattresses! When we move, we empty the air out and I do not have to carry heavy furniture downstairs!
customer_reviews.author: Kellie without the K

customer_reviews.title: Awesome airbed!
customer_reviews.text: Needed an airbed for company and my husband wanted to get the one from Costco, since he was familiar with it, but this one was cheaper and had great reviews so I decided to try it. So glad I did! We slept on it one night and guests used it for a week. We all loved it. They said it was the most comfortable one they had ever slept on. Also super easy to inflate/deflate. Lost a bit of air the first couple nights, but easy to top off and overall not an issue. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: shootingstar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Air Mattress!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the air mattress in my fifth wheel RV. I inflated it and let it sit three days, for all the seams to adjust before use. The instructions call for a 24 hour period to do this. A friend, who weighs 240 pounds, slept on it for three nights. It held up very well. We deflated and put it away each day. It didn’t lose any air over night. I’ve had several disappointing junk air mattresses over time, but this one is a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Viper

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold air all night
customer_reviews.text: Mattress blew up easily and I thought oh great.... this will be well worth the money. The night started out great but it slowly leaked a small bit of air all night. Noticed this as I attempted to turn over and had difficulty. Blew it up again hoping the air would stay but not to be. Back it goes unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Metier

customer_reviews.title: Extremely fast inflation and deflation, good substantial material
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter who was staying with friends at college homecoming. Tested it and it was superfast. She used it two nights, loved the rapid inflation and deflation, comfortable sleep, sits high off the ground. Appears to be a substantial and well crafted airbed.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Easy for Household Use, Not for Travel or Camping
customer_reviews.text: Mattress was easy to inflate with a regular indoor plug, however, when trying to inflate the mattress using a car converter plug, the voltage was not enough to inflate the mattress. There is NO manual override for the pump, so you cannot blow this mattress up by hand or electric pump if you do not have ample electricity. This makes it impossible to use while camping or during a power outage of any sort. As far as durability, we’ve been using the mattress for about five days straight now and we have had to inflate it almost every morning, which is disappointing. We are not heavy, and weigh less than 350lbs combined. I’m a little disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Good mattress but the smell is terrible
customer_reviews.text: The only reason for four stars, is the smell. I have this mattress now for 3 days and the smell of rubber doesn’t go away! If you are to sensitive to odors or smell that would not work for you! Otherwise mattress doesn’t lose air, it took less than a min to inflate! It’s firm mattress.
customer_reviews.author: rita

customer_reviews.title: Everything Works Exactly as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: A 6'2", 200 lb family member has been using this as his primary bed. Every few days it needs a little spurt of re-inflation, but the built-in electric air pump makes this a snap. Just leave it plugged in and ready to go. The bed is very comfortable -- no add-on mattress topper necessary. It's also easy to get in to and out of, since the mattress is raised about 1 and a 1/2 ft off the floor. Deflated and folded up, it's also incredibly compact. A standard twin sheet set fits this mattress perfectly. It's no surprise that this item was tagged as "Amazon's Choice" on their website.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: This inflates fast, durable bottom. Holds my 270lb body and my wife's 140lb body just fine. Never leaked.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: We have used this for three months now and we are very happy with the product. We were skeptical before buying and trying this kind of product. But, after using this for so long and feeling great everyday, we are finally happy to bring home this low cost wonderful product. After few weeks of using this alone, we bought a king size mattress pad to tuck on the bed, which made the experience of sleeping even better. Overall, we are happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Puja

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two twin air mattresses, one of which was defective. I contacted customer service and received a replacement within a few days. The mattresses are easy to inflate and deflate. Each one comes with a carry bag for storage. You'll need a deep fitted sheet set since the mattress inflates to roughly 16 inches in height. I combined the two mattresses to create a king and added a mattress pad to keep the two together. Additionally, this will minimize the air channel rolls you'll feel otherwise, that run from top to bottom and side to side.
customer_reviews.author: Northwest

customer_reviews.title: Strong durable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great inflatable bed sturdy fast to inflate or deflate i love it hasn't been used by my guests yet but as soon i received it i inflate it and it's a perfect sturdy strong material i got the queen size.
customer_reviews.author: Mony

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Best air mattress I have ever owned. Easy to use, durable and actually comfortable. This is the first air mattress I can say is comfortable. I recommend following the directions and filling it then letting it sit for the 12 hours. It allows the seems to stretch. Arrived 2 days early. Set it up. Let it sit for 1 day. Had to put some more air in. Easiest air mattress to inflate! After sleeping on the mattress for 2 days, my friends asked me where I got it and how much did I pay. They could not believe the price compared to the quality of the product and purchased one that day!
customer_reviews.author: William Strayer

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY POPPED AFTER ONE USE....
customer_reviews.text: WELL AFTER 2 USES ONE OF THE SEAMS POPPED AND THE ENTIRE BED NOW NEEDS TO BE TRASHED!!! ONE PERSON SLEEPING ON IT....ONE DAY AFTER THE RETURN PERIOD GO FIGURE!!!! AND PATCHES ARE SO OLD THEY WONT EVEN BEGIN TO WORK
customer_reviews.author: JnJ

customer_reviews.title: It dyed clothes!!! I had to return it
customer_reviews.text: It dyed my clothes in blue. I rubbed it with wet clothes to remove any blue dust, but it dyed it too. And it didn't come back to original color. Be careful.
customer_reviews.author: yukyong

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: I have a bad back and I cant find a mattress that works for me. This does. I can control the firmness! Very easy to use. I have slept on air mattress on and off for years and this is so far the best. I'm getting up there in the years and getting up and out of a bed is getting difficult, but the height is great. I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I slept on this for quite a while and was so pleasantly surprised. Very high up and easy to make bed though I did use a full fitted sheet and twin top sheet because of the depth. No aches or pains despite sleeping on it for months. It will be fabulous to use for company and such.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use when my daughter and her husband visit us and the guest bedrooms are unavailable. We used it over the holidays and the mattress worked very well. Easy to set up, retains air well (with an occasional "topping off"), and stores conveniently. I'm very happy with the purchase and would recommend this mattress for the use I described.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Davidson, M.D.

customer_reviews.title: EnerPlex never-leak Inflatable air mattresses (2) (Twin size)
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these; one for me and one for my husband when we go camping. One of them totally deflated within an hour and when we inflated it again it deflated every time. For $79 I would expect something more sturdy and reliable. It was aggravating to find myself on the floor of the tent in 40 degree weather in the mountains! Thank goodness I took my backup cot just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Easy Inflate, Easy Deflate
customer_reviews.text: You need to know the first time you use it it is recommended to fill and wait 12 hours then add more air as needed prior to sleeping on it. This allows the mattress to stretch and expand without the pressure. I was not prepared for that so it was one night of sleeping in a recliner but after that it was fine. Easy set up, easy to deflate with nothing more than an outlet.... everything is built right in.
customer_reviews.author: Alycat

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but heavy to pack up.
customer_reviews.text: I found this to be handy for a quick setup. But it does lose air at night but I’m to lazy to get up a fill because of the noise of the Air pump and did not want wake the rest of the others in the house. Works for me as a quick set up.
customer_reviews.author: rkwsr

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best, most durable air mattress I've ever had (and I've had plenty). Even more important, customer service is Johnny-on-the-spot. They have a 2-year warranty on their product, highly unusual for air mattresses. After months and months of daily use, mine was beginning to lose air. They responded to my request immediately and I had a replacement in 2 days. I will definitely continue to buy their products!
customer_reviews.author: docmcr

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: We were going to visit our daughter so we had this shipped to her so we could use it there. It's an air bed, which, in my opinion, aren't that comfortable anyway, so we kind of knew what we were in for. The pump is super easy to use to blow up and take down. It does lose a little air overnight but it's easy enough to refresh. It packs easily and the bag is adequate for it to pack in.
customer_reviews.author: Linnea

customer_reviews.title: Short lifespan
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this February 2020. Within a few months, a leaked occurred. We tried finding where the leak was coming from, but was unable to do so. I contacted the company and they replaced the mattress with another. Once again, a couple months later, another leak on this second mattress. I give up on this product. I’m very frustrated and don’t want to deal with replacement, and most likely receive another mattress that will leak. For the amount I paid for it, it should be of higher quality, and last longer than a few months. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JustJeri

customer_reviews.title: What a bargain!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best airmattress I have owned. It's easy to set up and put away. I purchased the king size and it has plenty of room for two adults. It comes with two patches and a nice nag to store it in. The controls allow you to easily inflate and deflate on its own.there is also a little compartment to store the plug. The line for the plug is short but this it is well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Far Exceeded Expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I've never come across an inflatable mattress that is as solidly reliable and comfortable as this one! It has been set up for a month now and is showing no signs of deflating. Seriously! My stepmom visited for 10 days and only inflated the mattress one time and then only because she had let more air out than she liked. She even loaded ALL of her considerable luggage on top of it when she arrived and it didn't matter at all. She says this air mattress was even more comfortable than most traditional mattresses and wanted to buy one herself. This was definitely a fantastic buy!
customer_reviews.author: The Humble Food Snob

customer_reviews.title: Decent product.
customer_reviews.text: Mostly fine for a night sleep. Looses air more that I want to. Need to pump at lease once every day. Also, if the other person turns or tosses, you get bumped. Not that I did not know or expect this. Still wanted to state the obvious. I gave 4 star because it did not hold air as well as I think it should. Also, the pump is very loud and cannot be used after people sleep the house.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy R

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Opened box, inflated mattress and heart air escaping after I closed the valve. I found a small hole in the mattress, right out of the box. I patched it but patch did nothing. Mattress kept losing air through the night. Contacted seller who sent a new one. By that time I was so turned off by the quality I decided to return the replacement unopened.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: We finally found a WINNER!
customer_reviews.text: After countless guest visits and camping trips with our previous air mattress (which was overpriced) we decided to try this EnerPlex air mattress, and I'm so glad we did! It is super high quality, and inflated in literally like a minute. The bed is very comfortable, the instructions are really straightforward, and it comes with a nice oversized carry bag to take it on the go!
customer_reviews.author: Heather M. Hewitt

customer_reviews.title: Ended up sleeping on the floor.
customer_reviews.text: This product did not live up to the description of puncture proof, or durable. While inflating the bed one evening I heard a hissing noise. I located a small holes, used the repair kit and reinflated it. Every few days it needed airing. Shortly thereafter, the hole got larger and it became impossible to keep it elevated. I'd go to bed with air in the bed, and awaken closer to the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Writer1

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and quick inflation
customer_reviews.text: So we bought this bed as a lift assist if dad falls. It can inflate quickly with him sitting on it and it lifts him to a chair height so it’s easy for him to get up the rest of the way. We know it’s not advertised for this but it has been awesome! We have already used it twice and both times it did great. Saved us so much money.
customer_reviews.author: Mkero

customer_reviews.title: NOT Double High
customer_reviews.text: The height is very misleading. First, its advertised as "Double High". The second picture is accurate in that the bed measures 13 inches high. I've never seen a bed 6.5 inches high, so I'm not sure how they are describing it as "double high". Even though the 2nd picture is accurate, pictures 1, 4, 6, and the video show a bed that appears to be much higher than 13 inches. It was not "false" advertising, but very misleading to say the least. If you're going to describe an airbed as "double-high", it should be higher than your knees. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Company sent replacement mattress
customer_reviews.text: We liked it at first but after only a few uses, got a hole and deflated. Tried calling their customer service number and didnt go through to anyone. Really disappointed in the quality. Update: 10/3 The company responded to my review though not my call. They sent a replacement air mattress which we really appreciate. It took more than a week to get to us, so we were sleeping on a leaky air mattress during that time. Overall, grateful for the replacement and the company standing by the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa Sears

customer_reviews.title: Much Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: bought this to accommodate a guest at my home over a weekend, was very impressed with the thickness of the material when I set up the mattress and how fast the pump blew it up. the built in cord is nice and the carrying bag is handy for storage. Said guest was a 6'3" 200 lb male, who was pretty happy with the whole sleeping experience on this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch S

customer_reviews.title: COMFY, YOU WILL LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I love this queen size air mattress, it’s very comfortable, and I sleep, like I’m on a cloud! I have a Temperpedic bed at home, A $5,500 dollar bed, and this air mattress sleeps, as good or better. Very easy to blow up, directions are self explanatory. Very durable. I sent this to my sons house in Arizona, so it would be there, when I arrived. I didn’t want to go through the hustle and bustle, when I got there. It was so easy! I flew out there and it was ready for me. You won’t go wrong with this air mattress, you will absolutely Love It!
customer_reviews.author: Kay Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great to do business with..Big Thanks
customer_reviews.text: Great company to do business with. Defective air mattress was replaced and the company was more concerned with taking care of me and making sure as a customer that I was completely satisfied and rushed a new one to me..I can't say enough how much this experience has been to me. Gladly endorse them and differently will be doing business with them.. Big Thanks.. satisfied customer.. Gerry
customer_reviews.author: stonesrus

customer_reviews.title: 2 year warranty my A$$
customer_reviews.text: First time inflating a pinhole sized hole showed up near the velvety top. I had to use the patch provided in the box first night before even using the mattress! I contacted the company for “2 year warranty” just to get crickets. Haven’t heard from them once. And it’s passed the 30days I ordered to return to amazon so now I’m out $80. Don’t buy this mattress for the warranty. Do yourself a favor and try another brand and maybe just spend the extra $$.
customer_reviews.author: matt blanco

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I use it in my semi truck sleeper, it is less costly than a memory foam and just as good. I do add a 1.5 gel foam topper to make it feel better also. I do like airbeds, and this is a good product to have. How long it lasts, is another issue when it comes to leaks. I will update this product as time goes on, just put in my semi 1 week ago. I am very pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: smshariff

customer_reviews.title: Twin size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this one because it was an elevated twin size mattress it was very easy to inflate it was very easy also to disinflate I love the fact that it comes with a very carry-on easy bag to manage the only one thing I would say is it has a little bit of a loud motor but the air in it stays very well you don't really need to reinflate the mattress every day in fact you can go to three days without having to but it does for what it needs to do for the visiting person
customer_reviews.author: lostnguatemala

customer_reviews.title: Takes "deflates quickly" to a whole new level
customer_reviews.text: Have used it for 3 days now. It already flattens after a single night of sleep. The first nights it at least stayed half inflated. I weight 212 lbs, so it has practically no weight capacity. For a queen sized mattress, that should be nothing. Don't trust it, don't buy it. Already looking for a replacement so I can return it. Unfortunately, don't have anything else to sleep on until then, but will let you know how the return process goes once I get started.
customer_reviews.author: BiosHacker001

customer_reviews.title: Comfort is gr8,  ease of use. Not one problem in 6 mths nightly use!
customer_reviews.text: It's the bomb! Bought one (defective). Amazon made return super easy with no cost to me. I've gotten the replacement and have been sleeping on it for months. Only have to air it up maybe once a week. It has never collapsed or sank down. It's comfortable by itself, but since I use it nightly I put a memory foam topper just because the softer the bed the better my bad back feels. If taking a trip it's a breeze to deflate, fold and stick it in its little bag. It goes where I go.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Everett

product_meta.title: EnerPlex Luxury Queen Deluxe Raised Air Mattress with Built in Pump Flocked Top Inflatable Upgraded Queen Size Airbed with Built-in Pump Elevated Raised Air Mattress Blow Up Bed & 2-Year Warranty
feature_bullets: 1-minute Cutting Edge Pump & Luxurious Quilt Top Flocking

30-DAY MONEY BACK GUARANTEE PLUS AN UNHEARD OF 2-YEAR WARRANTY WITH LIFETIME SUPPORT - 2020 NEWLY UPGRADED Queen Air Mattress with 2 MINUTE Built-In PUMP TECHNOLOGY - EnerPlex Queen Size Air Mattress offers an inflatable airbed and a one of a kind 2-minute built-in pump (120V / 210W). ONLY TWO MINUTES TO INFLATE A DOUBLE HIGH LUXURY AIRBED! Fastest pump on the market - Our Queen Luxury Airbed was designed for portability and fast use. Our coilbeam technology ensures maximum comfort!

MAXIMUM DURABILITY, BUILT TO LAST: EnerPlex Airbeds are comprised of Waterproof, puncture resistant PVC with EXTREME Luxury comfort top flocking to prevent leaking or movement while sleeping - rock solid stability. Our PREMIUM Flocked top Queen Air Mattress surface delivers a real bed sleeping experience on an inflatable air mattress. PLUS, the built-in pump provides the fastest blow up on the market.

COIL BEAM CONSTRUCTION: Double High Queen Airbed offers CUSTOM COIL-BEAM TECHNOLOGY FOR EXTRA COMFORT: The EnerPlex Queen Air Mattress Coil beams were designed to give you maximum comfort and will mimic the experience of a real bed. The 18” Queen Airbed profile allows the same height as you would find in a chair. Simply wake up and roll out of bed with ease after a great nights sleep. Our airbeds are designed for indoor / outdoor use.

NEVER-LEAK TECHNOLOGY: Not only can you blow up your Queen Air Mattress in under 2 minutes, it also holds the air! The pump allows you to inflate / deflate quickly to achieve your desired comfort level. We suggest you fill up the airbed until fully firm, let the material stretch and then inflate/deflate to your desired comfort level. Whether you like a firm airbed or a soft air mattress, EnerPlex has you covered!

Should you have ANY issue's with your EnerPlex Queen Air Mattress contact us directly and we will make it right immediately. Our customer service team is obsessed with making your blow-up bed experience the best. That's the EnerPlex promise!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars764 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Fabric Type: 1-minute Cutting Edge Pump & Luxurious Quilt Top Flocking
